welcomeModal.helloFellowDeveloper:
**Functional Purpose**: Greeting for developers in the welcome modal.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí Header H1
**When Users See This**: When a new user selects a 'developer' seniority level (junior, mid, senior) and views the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Hello fellow developer üëã"
welcomeModal.exercismDeepenSkills:
**Functional Purpose**: Introduction to Exercism's purpose and offerings.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí Header paragraph
**When Users See This**: When a new user selects a 'developer' seniority level and views the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Includes variable `numTracks` which must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Exercism is the place to deepen your programming skills and explore over {numTracks} programming languages. It's 100% free."
welcomeModal.thanksForJoining:
**Functional Purpose**: Expresses gratitude for the user joining.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí H2 heading
**When Users See This**: When a new user selects a 'developer' seniority level and views the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Thanks for joining!"
welcomeModal.madeByThousands:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains Exercism's community-driven nature.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí Paragraph below H2
**When Users See This**: When a new user selects a 'developer' seniority level and views the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Exercism has been made by thousands of people who want to create a fun, powerful educational platform that makes it easy to learn and deepen your programming skills. We're really glad you've joined us for the ride! Check our forums, Youtube and Twitch to explore everything Exercism has to offer üéâ"
welcomeModal.watchWelcomeVideo:
**Functional Purpose**: Instructions for getting started after joining.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí Paragraph below community description
**When Users See This**: When a new user selects a 'developer' seniority level and views the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "To get started, watch the welcome video on the right then head to the Tracks page and choose the language you want to explore first. Solve the classic "Hello World" exercise to familiarize yourself with the platform, then start solving exercises for real."
welcomeModal.gotItCloseModal:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to dismiss the welcome modal.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí Primary action button
**When Users See This**: When viewing the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Got it! Close this modal."
welcomeModal.startWithWelcomeVideo:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the welcome video section.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí RHS section H2
**When Users See This**: When a new user selects a 'developer' seniority level and views the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Start with our welcome video üëáüèΩ"
welcomeModal.whereCanIJoin:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for information about specific events like #48in24.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí RHS section H2
**When Users See This**: When a new user selects a 'developer' seniority level and views the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Where can I join #48in24?"
welcomeModal.discoveredExercism:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains how to join special events like #48in24.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Developer View) ‚Üí RHS section paragraph
**When Users See This**: When a new user selects a 'developer' seniority level and views the developer welcome content.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Discovered Exercism because of #48in24 or one of our featured months? Good stuff! Once you've watched the video above, close this modal and you'll see a big graphic on the right-hand side advertising #48in24. Click on that and follow the instructions to get started!"
initialView.welcomeToExercism:
**Functional Purpose**: Main welcome heading for new users.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Initial View) ‚Üí Header H1
**When Users See This**: When a new user first opens the welcome modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Welcome to Exercism! üíô"
initialView.letsMakeSure:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory text to ensure a good user experience.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Initial View) ‚Üí Paragraph below H1
**When Users See This**: When a new user first opens the welcome modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Let's make sure that you get the most out of Exercism."
initialView.howExperienced:
**Functional Purpose**: Question to gauge user's developer experience.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Initial View) ‚Üí Paragraph below introductory text
**When Users See This**: When a new user first opens the welcome modal.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "How experienced a developer are you?"
initialView.absoluteBeginner:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for users with no prior programming experience.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Initial View) ‚Üí 'Absolute Beginner' button
**When Users See This**: When a new user first opens the welcome modal and is prompted to select their experience level.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text. Corresponds to `absolute_beginner` seniority level.
**Current English**: "Absolute Beginner"
initialView.beginner:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for users with very little programming experience.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Initial View) ‚Üí 'Beginner' button
**When Users See This**: When a new user first opens the welcome modal and is prompted to select their experience level.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text. Corresponds to `beginner` seniority level.
**Current English**: "Beginner"
initialView.juniorDeveloper:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for users with some foundational development experience.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Initial View) ‚Üí 'Junior Developer' button
**When Users See This**: When a new user first opens the welcome modal and is prompted to select their experience level.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text. Corresponds to `junior` seniority level.
**Current English**: "Junior Developer"
initialView.midLevelDeveloper:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for users with moderate development experience.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Initial View) ‚Üí 'Mid-level Developer' button
**When Users See This**: When a new user first opens the welcome modal and is prompted to select their experience level.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text. Corresponds to `mid` seniority level.
**Current English**: "Mid-level Developer"
initialView.seniorDeveloper:
**Functional Purpose**: Option for users with extensive development experience.
**UI Location**: Welcome Modal (Initial View) ‚Üí 'Senior Developer' button
**When Users See This**: When a new user first opens the welcome modal and is prompted to select their experience level.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text. Corresponds to `senior` seniority level.
**Current English**: "Senior Developer"
